name: The Troll Platformer (UP927411)
description:
This game is what it says on the tin it is a troll platformer, it is not easy and it can get annoying, so don't say you were not warned 

In the game there is only one premade asset that is the soundtrack of which i got from "Sound Phenomenon Fantasy" of which i got for free on the unreal marketplace, this means you can use it on any unreal project.

Tip: think outside the box, it is not simple, also look out for clues (there is a clue at the very start)
